DOC.criteria: Has Dry Eye disease indicate stain score ≥ 4 Speed score > 6 Concurrent involvement clinical trial Anticipated contact lens wear study 14hours prior Day History corneal transplant Active ocular infection , uveitis nonKCS inflammation History recurrent herpes keratitis active disease within last six month Topical ophthalmic medication study Temporary collagen punctal plug within one week prior study .
